title: I cannot cancel the Google Assistant reminders.
content:
Pixel 2 XL

A couple of days ago, I asked Google Assistant, "Hey Google, remind me to [task] at 11 o'clock tomorrow." I later added a second reminder for a different task.

The next day, Google reminded me on my phone at the right times, which was great.

However, since then, Google keeps on reminding me. It happens without fail every time when I restart the phone, and at arbitrary other times. The notification shows both of my old reminders. (See the attached screenshot of my notification.)

Here is what I've tried.

Tap the notification, which opens the Google Assistant and shows me that there are no reminders.
Press "Done" on the notification, which closes the notification.
Swipe the notification away.
As already mentioned, restart the phone (several times already).

But still, I keep getting reminders.

How do I cancel these old reminders, please?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
